text: Bangor is a town in Franklin County, New York, United States. There were 2,231 people living in Bangor at the 2020 census. The town was founded around 1806. It is named after Bangor in Wales. == Communities and locations in Bangor == *Baconville - A former community in the southwest part of the town. *Bangor - The hamlet of Bangor is in the south part of the town. *Cooks Corners - A hamlet in the north of the town. *North Bangor - A hamlet in the north of the town. *West Bangor - A hamlet west of Bangor village. It was formerly called "Pottersville." == References == Category:Towns in New York (state) Category:1806 establishments in the United States Category:1800s establishments in New York (state)
title: Bangor, New York
